column3: 2015 condolences service information candles symbolic gestures photos memories share this tribute add photo add memory add condolence of olivia mc. guireolivia (nee: mc. gorrian) mc. guire of chester borough passed away friday june 12
column4: 2015 at morristown memorial hospital. born in lurgan
column6: she has lived in chester borough since 1978. a us naval flight nurse known to her patients as ""miss mac""
column7: olivia served her country from 1946 to 1950 in guam
column9: and at st. albans navy hospital in queens ny. an extremely patriotic american
column10: she was a devout roman catholic with a deep and everlasting love for her family. beloved wife for 65 years of george p. mc. guire
column11: m. d. devoted mother of george p. mc. guire and his wife diane
column13: jack mc. guire and his wife kathleen and noel t. mc. guire and his wife sharon. cherished grandmother of tara
column16: margaret and kaitlin. relatives and friends are respectfully invited to attend olivia's life celebration on wednesday june 17 from 6:00pm to 9:00pm at the william j. leber funeral home
column18: chester (908-879-3090). a funeral mass will be offered on thursday june 18 at 10:30am at st. lawrence r. c. church in chester followed by interment in pleasant hill cemetery in chester. in lieu of flowers memorial donations may be made to st. jude children's research hospital (www. stjude. org). print add condolence who we are:we are a family owned funeral home and are genuinely dedicated and committed to family service. our qualified staff is available 24 hours a day and we are available to assist your family in customizing a funeral or cremation service that reflects your desires. our location:15 furnace road. chester
